entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:48 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 12:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 5.0°C
Wind: S 20 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1
